V.iv.1.B.6.e
.
Accrued Grant Template
When granting an accrued benefit claim, use the language generated by enabling the accrued grant template accessible from VBMS-R's PROFILE tab.
Note
:  The accrued template is only available for selection if the Veteran is deceased.  When generated, the accrued grant template will appear at the top of the first page of the
Codesheet
below the data tables.
Reference
:  For more information on the accrued grant template, see the
VBMS-R User Guide
.
